Package au.edu.anu.twapps.mm

Interface IGraphVisualiser

public interface IGraphVisualiser
Author Ian Davies - 9 Aug 2019 Interface for the "view" of Model-View-Controller

  • Method Details

    • initialiseView

      void initialiseView​(double duration)
      Actions required to build the initial view from the graph.
      Parameters:
      duration - Duration in ms of animations.

    • onNewNode

      void onNewNode​(VisualNode node)
      Actions required to add visualisation elements for a node newly added to the graph.
      Parameters:
      node - The node to add to the view.

    • onNewEdge

      void onNewEdge​(VisualEdge edge, double duration)
      Actions required to add visualisation elements for an edge newly added to the graph.
      Parameters:
      edge - Edge that has been added.
      duration - Duration in ms of animation.

    • collapseTreeFrom

      void collapseTreeFrom​(VisualNode root, double duration)
      Actions required to collapse a sub-tree to the given root.
      Parameters:
      root - Root of the sub-tree to be hidden.
      duration - Duration in ms of animation.

    • expandTreeFrom

      void expandTreeFrom​(VisualNode root, double duration)
      Actions required to expand a sub-tree from the given root.
      Parameters:
      root - Root of the sub-tree to be expanded.
      duration - Duration in ms of animation.

    • getVisualGraph

      fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.TreeGraph<VisualNode,​VisualEdge> getVisualGraph()
      Get the underlying graph (the layout graph) of the visualisation.
      Returns:
      layout graph.

    • close

      void close()
      Clear all elements of the view.

    • removeView

      void removeView​(VisualNode node)
      Actions required to remove all visual elements of a node.
      Parameters:
      node - The node to remove.

    • removeView

      void removeView​(VisualEdge edge)
      Actions required to remove all visual elements of an edge.
      Parameters:
      edge - The edge to remove

    • onNewParent

      void onNewParent​(VisualNode child)
      Actions required to create visual elements depicting a new parent-child relationship.
      Parameters:
      child - The child VisualNode of the relationship.

    • doLayout

      void doLayout​(VisualNode root, double jitterFaction, LayoutType layoutType, boolean pcShowing, boolean xlShowing, boolean sideline, double duration)
      Re-apply the layout algorithm.
      Parameters:
      root - Root of the layout (if LayoutType is a tree algorithm).
      jitterFaction - Amount of random displacement to apply (relative to drawing dimension)
      layoutType - Choice of algorithm LayoutType.
      pcShowing - Show parent-child relationships.
      xlShowing - Show cross-links.
      sideline - Place all isolated nodes to one side.
      duration - Duration in ms of animation.

    • onRemoveParentLink

      void onRemoveParentLink​(VisualNode child)
      Remove visual elements between this child VisualNode and its parent.
      Parameters:
      child - The child node.

    • onNodeRenamed

      void onNodeRenamed​(VisualNode node)
      Update VisualNode after being renamed.
      Parameters:
      node - The VisualNode to update.

    • onEdgeRenamed

      void onEdgeRenamed​(VisualEdge edge)
      Update VisualEdge after being renamed.
      Parameters:
      edge - The VisualEdge to update.

    • onHighlightLocalGraph

      void onHighlightLocalGraph​(VisualNode centerNode, int depth)
      Highlight all parts of the graph within the given depth of the given root node.
      Parameters:
      centerNode - The node at the center of the local graph.
      depth - Maximum path depth in the display.

    • onHighlightAll

      void onHighlightAll()
      Return view to normal after highlighting a local portion.

    • collapsePredef

      void collapsePredef()
      Collapses (hides) the pre-defined sub-tree. This is use when a configuration is first created to remove clutter.

    • onRollback

      void onRollback​(fr.cnrs.iees.graph.impl.TreeGraph<VisualNode,​VisualEdge> layoutGraph)
      Update the view after rollback to a previous state of the configuration graph and the ModelMaker controls.
      Parameters:
      layoutGraph - The layout graph of VisualNode and VisualEdge.

    • setLayoutRoot

      void setLayoutRoot​(VisualNode root)
      Update the view when a new root is chosen for the layout. This method should not re-apply the layout. If the root is null the true root of the graph is used (World).
      Parameters:
      root - VisualNode that is now the root of the layout (can be null).
